branchCategory.name: LEYG, Electric Actuator, Guide Rod Type, AC Servo Motor (100/200W)
branchCategory.description: The AC servo version of the LEYG guided rod features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The actuator features a bolt-on bearing block with double guide rods that resist rotational and lateral loads. The AC servo motor enables higher speed, acceleration, and pushing force. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg (horizontal); 46 kg (vertical) <LI>Maximum pushing force: 736 N <LI>Maximum stroke: 300 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder <LI>Bearing types: sliding bushings or ball bushing bearings <LI>Maximum allowable rotational torque: 5.76 Nâ€¢m (sizes 32, 40; stroke dependent) <LI>Non-rotating accuracy of plate: ±0.05° (slide bearing); ±0.06° (ball bushing bearing)</LI></UL>
